properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee saakshyamu edi ? nee bali arpana edi ? (2) Prabhu Yesu nangeekarinchi nidrinchedavela ? (1) Prabhu Yesu nangeekarinchi jaagu chesedavela ? (1) Melko lemmu (2) raarammu viswaasi (1){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apostalula kaalamandu upadravamula oththidilo (2) Anninti sahinchuchu (2) aathmalaadaayamu chesiri (1){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rallatho kottabadiri rampaalache koyabadiri Parama darsanamondi suvaartanu chaatinchiri{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Koradaatho kottabadiri cherasaalayandunchabadiri Cherasaala sankellunu vaari naatanka parachaledu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sajeeva yaagamuga prabhu sevanu jariginchiri suvaartha Prabalamaaye sanghamu staapinchabade{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kothavistaaramentho kotha koyuvaaru kondare yesunin Piluchuchunde throsi vesedavaa prabhu pilupun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Arpincheda nannu aathma praana shareeramutho Naa siluvanu ethukoni ninne vembadintunu nenu{/lang-eng}
